committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To allow property owners to maintain existing structures designed for human habitation at Lake Sidney Lanier, Georgia.
short_title: Lake Sidney Lanier Home Preservation Act

summary.text: Lake Sidney Lanier Home Preservation Act - Directs the Secretary of the Army to establish and provide public notice of a program to: (1) convey to eligible property owners the right to maintain existing structures for human habitation (constructed before January 1, 2000) on lands acquired by the United States for the Lake Sidney Lanier, Georgia, project; or (2) release eligible property owners from the rights acquired by the United States to prohibit structures for human habitation on lands surrounding the Lake to a specified elevation, with respect to existing structures. Sets forth requirements for regulations governing actions by the Army Corps of Engineers and property owners seeking to establish eligibility under such program.

titles.title: Lake Sidney Lanier Home Preservation Act
To allow property owners to maintain existing structures designed for human habitation at Lake Sidney Lanier, Georgia.
